connect20/nthmobile_easywebshopsms.name: connect20/NthMobile_EasyWebShopSMS

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/nthmobile_easywebshopsms.description:
Use EasyWebShop SMS to send different SMS alerts from your web shop to your customers. If you have to send event-dependent notifications or create SMS marketing campaigns, EasyWebShop SMS is the right solution for you.

EasyWebShop SMS is a plugin based on SMS API technology.
